title: Raw Conversions for Advertising Platform
description: Raw Data that holds Cross Channel Advertising Conversion Events.

xdm:logId.title: Internal identifier for the batch
xdm:logId.description: Internal identifier for the batch represented in the YYYYMMDDHH24 format

xdm:conversionTime.title: Conversion Time
xdm:conversionTime.description: Timestamp that indicates when the conversion event occured

xdm:triggerTime.title: Trigger Time
xdm:triggerTime.description: Timestamp that indicates when the click event occured

xdm:advertiserId.title: Advertiser Identifier
xdm:advertiserId.description: Advertiser ID for the campaign that initiated the conversion event

xdm:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
xdm:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Property Name Configured by Pixel, Analytics, Custom Feeds

xdm:clientId1.title: Client ID1
xdm:clientId1.description: Alphanumeric strings that are matched against clicks to extract keyword,creative,adgroup IDs along with keyword text and matchtype

xdm:clientId2.title: Client ID2
xdm:clientId2.description: Alphanumeric strings that are matched against clicks to extract keyword,creative,adgroup IDs along with keyword text and matchtype

xdm:accountId.title: Account Identifier
xdm:accountId.description: Account ID for the search advertising platform campaign that initiated the conversion event

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Campaign ID on the advertising platform

xdm:placementId.title: Placement Identifier
xdm:placementId.description: Placement ID on the display advertising platform. It will be populated only for non-search advertising related campaigns

xdm:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
xdm:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform

xdm:adId.title: Ad Identifier
xdm:adId.description: Ad ID on the advertising platform

xdm:term.title: Search Term
xdm:term.description: Search Term that contributed to the conversion

xdm:termId.title: Search Term Identifier
xdm:termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform

xdm:matchType.title: Term Match Type
xdm:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad

xdm:lastClickUid.title: Last Click UID
xdm:lastClickUid.description: Unique Identifier of the Last Click Event

xdm:transactionId.title: Transaction Identifier
xdm:transactionId.description: Click Transaction Identifier of the Event

xdm:geoipLocationId.title: Geo IP Location Identifier
xdm:geoipLocationId.description: A numeric identifier that is obtained from Maxmindâ€™s GeoIP package that represents the Geo

xdm:referrerUrl.title: Referrer URL
xdm:referrerUrl.description: The referrer is the webpage that sends visitors to your site using a link

xdm:searchTerm.title: Search Term
xdm:searchTerm.description: Original Term used for the Search

xdm:linkType.title: Link Type
xdm:linkType.description: Query Parameter for Tracking URL that can have Site Link, Product Listing Ads or Product Title

xdm:surferRef.title: Surfer Reference
xdm:surferRef.description: Surfer Reference Identifier that triggered the event generally browser cookie

xdm:rawData.title: Raw Data
xdm:rawData.description: Raw Conversion Data as received from the Customer

xdm:clickThroughData.title: Click Through Data
xdm:clickThroughData.description: Attributed Revenue Stiched to the Click Event when a surfer clicks an Ad

xdm:clickThroughConversions.title: Click Through Conversions
xdm:clickThroughConversions.description: Count of Transaction Events with revenue attributed to the Click Event

xdm:clickThroughmaxdata.title: Click Through Max Data
xdm:clickThroughmaxdata.description: A keyword on a day could be attributed to multiple transaction events, this is the max of clickthrough data in the series/group

xdm:viewThroughData.title: View Through Maximum Data
xdm:viewThroughData.description: Count of Transaction Events with revenue attributed to the Impression Event

xdm:viewThroughConversions.title: View Through Conversions
xdm:viewThroughConversions.description: Raw Conversions Value if Triggering Event Type is Impression

xdm:viewThroughMaxData.title: View Through Maximum Data
xdm:viewThroughMaxData.description: A keyword on a day could be attributed to multiple transaction events, this is the max of viewthrough data in the series/group

xdm:channelType.title: Channel Type
xdm:channelType.description: The conversion event was triggered by which advertising channel - search, display, video

xdm:conversionType.title: Conversion Type
xdm:conversionType.description: Feed Conversion Type indicates where the conversion event originated from - examples client, analytics, cross device

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: The device from where the ad was displayed
